game.title: The Quest for the Golden Fleece
game.synopsis: In a world of myth and legend, a young hero named Jason sets out on a quest to find the Golden Fleece. Along the way, he must battle monsters, solve puzzles, and overcome treacherous obstacles. The fleece is said to grant the bearer eternal youth and beauty, but danger and uncertainty await Jason and his crew as they sail the seas and explore uncharted lands.
game.beginning: Jason and his crew set sail from Iolcus on the Argo, determined to find the Golden Fleece. They face their first challenge as they navigate the Symplegades, a pair of deadly clashing rocks that threaten to crush their ship.
game.ending: After many trials and tribulations, Jason finally reaches the Garden of the Hesperides, where the Golden Fleece is hidden. He retrieves it, but not without a fight from the fearsome dragon that guards it. With the fleece in hand, Jason returns to Iolcus as a hero, bringing eternal youth and beauty to his people.
